content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lime_concrete_powder
inventory=[{"type": "cactus", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "gravel", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "diamond_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 30, "index": 15}, {"type": "beef", "quantity": 27, "index": 19}, {"type": "diamond_chestplate", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "totem_of_undying", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "music_disc_strad", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 4, "index": 41}, {"type": "wet_sponge", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}]

thought: To craft a lime_concrete_powder, I first need to craft a lime dye. To do this, I will need to craft a green dye and a white dye. Since there is no white dye in the inventory, I will start by crafting the green dye. To craft a green dye, I need to smelt a cactus, which is located at slot 11. Therefore, I will smelt the cactus from slot 11 into an empty slot (eg., 12).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 11 to slot 12 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 12 to slot 1 with quantity 1
